Name: Secret of the Vikings - Mystery island
About the game: After a severe storm a group of Vikings and the brave Finnja strand on a strange island and face unknown challenges and dangers. Experience a thrilling adventure in the land of the northerners! Overcome all obstacles, use power-ups and earn bonuses and trophies. You'll find an exciting Match 3 game with puzzles and bonus games, power-ups and upgrades and extra levels! Features: - Build a Viking Village - Win various power-ups, upgrades, awards and extras - Solve puzzles, hidden object, solitaire and mahjongg games - Match3 game with lots of extras and exciting levels
